alert.note: Alert for Knox (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 12:49PM CDT until May 30 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 PM CDT FOR WESTERN KNOX COUNTY... At 1248 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Verdigre, or 27 miles north of Neligh, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Verdigre, Niobrara, Santee, Winnetoon, The Highway 14 And 59 Junction, Niobrara State Park and Santee Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CDT for northeastern Nebraska. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
